author: wtopstaff
title: Friday’s Sports Transactions
text:
By The Associated Press October 16, 2015 6:59 pm BASEBALL American League 
TEXAS RANGERS — Announced bullpen coach Andy Hawkins and hitting coach Dave Magadan will not return in 2016. Can-Am League 
NEW JERSEY JACKALS — Claimed INF Willie Carmona off waivers from Ottawa. BASKETBALL 
CHARLOTTE HORNETS — Signed G-F Damien Wilkins. 
NEW ORLEANS PELICANS — Signed G Nate Robinson. Waived C Mirza Begic. FOOTBALL National Football League 
NFL — Fined San Francisco RB Carlos Hyde $23,152 for using the crown of his helmet to make contact with New York Giants LB Jon Beason; Seattle DE Michael Bennett $20,000 for knocking down and diving on Cincinnati QB Andy Dalton during a Seahawks interception return; and Denver DE Malik Jackson $17,363 for a horse-collar tackle against Oakland during Oct. 11 games. Fined Pittsburgh DE Cam Heyward $5,787 for displaying a personal message with his eye black during an Oct. 12 game. 
BALTIMORE RAVENS — Signed G Marshal Yanda to a four-year contract extension. 
BUFFALO BILLS — Signed RB Miguel Maysonet to the practice squad. 
GREEN BAY PACKERS — Signed TE Mitchell Henry to the practice squad. Released TE Blake Annen from the practice squad. 
OAKLAND RAIDERS — Signed KR Walter Powell from the practice squad of Buffalo. 
WASHINGTON REDSKINS — Signed WR Colin Lockett to the practice squad. Placed WR Issac Blakeney on the practice squad-injured list. Canadian Football League 
WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS — Released QB Tajh Boyd from the practice roster. HOCKEY National Hockey League 
NHL — Suspended Tampa Bay Lightning D Nikita Nesterov for two games, without pay, for boarding Dallas Stars forward Curtis McKenzie during a game on Thursday, Oct. 15. 
NHL/NHLPA — Named Todd McLellan coach, Adam Graves special assistant to the general managers, Pat Verbeek and Paul Fenton director of player personnel and Ryan Jankowski director of operations for the 2016 Team North America. 
CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS — Assigned D Kyle Cumiskey and F Kyle Baun to Rockford (AHL). Recalled F Vincent Hinostroza from Rockford. 
DALLAS STARS — Recalled F Radek Faksa from Texas (AHL). Placed F Curtis McKenzie on injured reserve. 
DETROIT RED WINGS — Assigned D Alexey Marchenko to Grand Rapids (AHL). Placed RW Johan Franzen on seven-day injured reserve. 
TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING — Recalled D Slater Koekkoek from Syracuse (AHL). American Hockey League 
GRAND RAPIDS GRIFFINS — Released D Matt Corrente from his professional tryout. ECHL 
SOUTH CAROLINA STINGRAYS — Announced D Tyler Lewington was assigned to the team by Hershey (AHL). LACROSSE National Lacrosse League 
BUFFALO BANDITS — Agreed to terms with T Andrew Watt, D Anthony Malcolm, T Mike Triolo, MF Tim Edwards and D Matthew Clearwater-Francisco on one-year contracts. SOCCER Federation Internationale de Football Association 
FIFA — Suspended the Kuwait Football Association for government interference. COLLEGE 
OKLAHOMA CITY — Named Vinay Patel men’s basketball coach. 
SOUTH FLORIDA — Suspended junior CB Lamar Robbins from team activities for allegedly firing a gun on campus. Topics:
